TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create a Person message element in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates Person. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Person message schema area (for instance the 'Ground Picture > Intelligence Assessment' topic). Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created Person is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Person correctly.
